   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Tests of the dictionary file compiler.
   23: %%
   24: 
   25: -module(diameter_compiler_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: %% testcases, no common_test dependency
   28: -export([run/0,
   29:          run/1]).
   30: 
   31: %% common_test wrapping
   32: -export([
   33:          %% Framework functions
   34:          suite/0,
   35:          all/0,
   36:          init_per_suite/1,
   37:          end_per_suite/1,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_testcase/2,
   40:         
   41:          %% The test cases
   42:          format/1,
   43:          replace/1,
   44:          generate/1,
   45:          flatten1/1,
   46:          flatten2/1
   47:         ]).
   48: 
   49: -export([dict/0]).  %% fake dictionary module
   50: 
   51: %% dictionary callbacks for flatten2/1
   52: -export(['A1'/4, 'Unsigned32'/4]).
   53: 
   54: -include("diameter_util.hrl").
   55: 
   56: 
   57: %% ===========================================================================
   58: 
   59: -define(base, "base_rfc3588.dia").
   60: -define(S, atom_to_list).
   61: -define(L, integer_to_list).
   62: 
   63: -define(CL(F),    ?CL(F, [])).
   64: -define(CL(F, A), ?LOG("DCOMP", F, A)).
   65: 
   66: 
   67: %% ===========================================================================
   68: 
   69: %% RE/Replacement (in the sense of re:replace/4) pairs for morphing
   70: %% base_rfc3588.dia. The key is 'ok' or the the expected error as
   71: %% returned in the first element of the error tuple returned by
   72: %% diameter_make:codec/2.
   73: -define(REPLACE,
   74:         [{ok,
   75:           "",
   76:           ""},
   77:          {scan,
   78:           "@id 0",
   79:           "@id \\&"},
   80:          {scan,
   81:           "@name ",
   82:           "&'"},
   83:          {parse,
   84:           "@id 0",
   85:           "@id @id"},
   86:          {avp_code_already_defined,
   87:           "480",
   88:           "485"},
   89:          {uint32_out_of_range,
   90:           "@id 0",
   91:           "@id 4294967296"},
   92:          {uint32_out_of_range,
   93:           "@vendor 0",
   94:           "@vendor 4294967296"},
   95:          {uint32_out_of_range,
   96:           [{"^ *Failed-AVP .*$", "&V"},
   97:            {"@avp_types", "@avp_vendor_id 4294967296 Failed-AVP\n&"}]},
   98:          {imported_avp_already_defined,
   99:           "@avp_types",
  100:           "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc3588 &"},
  101:          {duplicate_import,
  102:           [{"@avp_types", "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc3588 Class\n&"},
  103:            {"@avp_types", "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc3588\n&"},
  104:            {"^@avp_types[^@]*", ""},
  105:            {"^@enum[^&]*", ""}]},
  106:          {duplicate_section,
  107:           "@prefix",
  108:           "@name"},
  109:          {already_declared,
  110:           "@enum Termination-Cause",
  111:           "& XXX 0\n &"},
  112:          {already_declared,
  113:           "@define Result-Code",
  114:           "& XXX 1000 &"},
  115:          {inherited_avp_already_defined,
  116:           "@id",
  117:           "@inherits nomod Origin-Host &"},
  118:          {avp_already_defined,
  119:           "@avp_types",
  120:           "@inherits m XXX\nXXX\n&"},
  121:          {avp_already_defined,
  122:           "@avp_types",
  123:           "@inherits mod1 XXX\n@inherits mod2 XXX\n&"},
  124:          {key_already_defined,
  125:           "DIAMETER_SUCCESS",
  126:           "& 2001\n&"},
  127:          {messages_without_id,
  128:           "@id 0",
  129:           ""},
  130:          {avp_name_already_defined,
  131:           "Class",
  132:           "& 666 Time M\n&"},
  133:          {avp_has_unknown_type,
  134:           "Enumerated",
  135:           "Enum"},
  136:          {avp_has_invalid_flag,
  137:           " -",
  138:           " X"},
  139:          {avp_has_duplicate_flag,
  140:           " -",
  141:           " MM"},
  142:          {ok,
  143:           "@vendor 0",
  144:           "@vendor 10415"},
  145:          {ok,
  146:           [{"@vendor 0", "@vendor 10415"},
  147:            {"Proxy-Info .*M$", "&V"},
  148:            {"Proxy-Info ::= [^>]*", "& 10415 "}]},
  149:          {grouped_vendor_id_without_flag,
  150:           [{"@vendor 0", "@vendor 10415"},
  151:            {"Proxy-Info ::= [^>]*", "& 10415 "}]},
  152:          {avp_has_vendor_id,
  153:           "@avp_types",
  154:           "@avp_vendor_id 667 Class\n&"},
  155:          {avp_has_no_vendor,
  156:           [{"^ *Class .*$", "&V"},
  157:            {"@vendor .*", ""}]},
  158:          {group_already_defined,
  159:           "@grouped",
  160:           "& Failed-AVP ::= < AVP Header: 279 > " "{AVP}\n&"},
  161:          {grouped_avp_code_mismatch,
  162:           "(Failed-AVP ::= [^0-9]*27)9",
  163:           "&8"},
  164:          {grouped_avp_has_wrong_type,
  165:           "(Failed-AVP *279 *)Grouped",
  166:           "\\1Time"},
  167:          {grouped_avp_not_defined,
  168:           "Failed-AVP *.*",
  169:           ""},
  170:          {grouped_avp_not_grouped,
  171:           "Failed-AVP ::=.*\n.*}",
  172:           ""},
  173:          {grouped_vendor_id_without_flag,
  174:           "(Failed-AVP .*)>",
  175:           "\\1 668>"},
  176:          {grouped_vendor_id_mismatch,
  177:           [{"(Failed-AVP .*)>", "\\1 17>"},
  178:            {"^ *Failed-AVP .*$", "&V"},
  179:            {"@avp_types", "@avp_vendor_id 18 Failed-AVP\n&"}]},
  180:          {ok,
  181:           [{"(Failed-AVP .*)>", "\\1 17>"},
  182:            {"^ *Failed-AVP .*$", "&V"}]},
  183:          {message_name_already_defined,
  184:           "CEA ::= .*:",
  185:           "& 257 > {Result-Code}\n&"},
  186:          {message_code_already_defined,
  187:           "CEA( ::= .*)",
  188:           "XXX\\1 {Result-Code}\n&"},
  189:          {message_has_duplicate_flag,
  190:           "(CER ::=.*)>",
  191:           "\\1, REQ>"},
  192:          {message_application_id_mismatch,
  193:          "(CER ::=.*)>",
  194:           "\\1 1>"},
  195:          {invalid_avp_order,
  196:           "CEA ::=",
  197:           "{Result-Code} &"},
  198:          {ok,
  199:           "{ Product-Name",
  200:           "* &"},
  201:          {required_avp_has_zero_max_arity,
  202:           "{ Product-Name",
  203:           "*0 &"},
  204:          {required_avp_has_zero_min_arity,
  205:           "{ Product-Name",
  206:           "0* &"},
  207:          {required_avp_has_zero_min_arity,
  208:           "{ Product-Name",
  209:           "0*0 &"},
  210:          {ok,
  211:           "{ Product-Name",
  212:           "*1 &"},
  213:          {ok,
  214:           "{ Product-Name",
  215:           "1* &"},
  216:          {ok,
  217:           "{ Product-Name",
  218:           "1*1 &"},
  219:          {ok,
  220:           "{ Product-Name",
  221:           "2* &"},
  222:          {ok,
  223:           "{ Product-Name",
  224:           "*2 &"},
  225:          {ok,
  226:           "{ Product-Name",
  227:           "2*2 &"},
  228:          {ok,
  229:           "{ Product-Name",
  230:           "2*3 &"},
  231:          {qualifier_has_min_greater_than_max,
  232:           "{ Product-Name",
  233:           "3*2 &"},
  234:          {ok,
  235:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  236:           "* &"},
  237:          {ok,
  238:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  239:           "0* &"},
  240:          {ok,
  241:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  242:           "*0 &"},
  243:          {ok,
  244:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  245:           "0*0 &"},
  246:          {ok,
  247:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  248:           "0*1 &"},
  249:          {ok,
  250:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  251:           "0*2 &"},
  252:          {ok,
  253:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  254:           "*1 &"},
  255:          {optional_avp_has_nonzero_min_arity,
  256:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  257:           "1* &"},
  258:          {optional_avp_has_nonzero_min_arity,
  259:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  260:           "1*1 &"},
  261:          {ok,
  262:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  263:           "*2 &"},
  264:          {optional_avp_has_nonzero_min_arity,
  265:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  266:           "2* &"},
  267:          {optional_avp_has_nonzero_min_arity,
  268:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  269:           "2*2 &"},
  270:          {optional_avp_has_nonzero_min_arity,
  271:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  272:           "2*3 &"},
  273:          {optional_avp_has_nonzero_min_arity,
  274:           "\\[ Origin-State-Id",
  275:           "3*2 &"},
  276:          {ok,
  277:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  278:           "* &"},
  279:          {ok,
  280:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  281:           "*0 &"},
  282:          {ok,
  283:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  284:           "0* &"},
  285:          {ok,
  286:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  287:           "0*0 &"},
  288:          {ok,
  289:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  290:           "0*1 &"},
  291:          {ok,
  292:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  293:           "0*2 &"},
  294:          {ok,
  295:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  296:           "*1 &"},
  297:          {ok,
  298:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  299:           "1* &"},
  300:          {ok,
  301:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  302:           "1*1 &"},
  303:          {ok,
  304:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  305:           "*2 &"},
  306:          {ok,
  307:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  308:           "2* &"},
  309:          {ok,
  310:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  311:           "2*2 &"},
  312:          {ok,
  313:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  314:           "2*3 &"},
  315:          {qualifier_has_min_greater_than_max,
  316:           "^ *< Session-Id",
  317:           "3*2 &"},
  318:          {avp_already_referenced,
  319:           "CER ::=.*",
  320:           "& {Origin-Host}"},
  321:          {message_missing,
  322:           "CER ::=",
  323:           "XXR ::= < Diameter-Header: 666, REQ > {Origin-Host} &"},
  324:          {requested_avp_not_found,
  325:           [{"@id", "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc3588 XXX &"},
  326:            {"CEA ::=", "<XXX> &"}]},
  327:          {requested_avp_not_found,
  328:           [{"@id", "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc3588 'X X X' &"},
  329:            {"CEA ::=", "<'X X X'> &"}]},
  330:          {enumerated_avp_has_wrong_local_type,
  331:           "Enumerated",
  332:           "Time"},
  333:          {enumerated_avp_not_defined,
  334:          [{"{ Disconnect-Cause }", ""},
  335:           {"^ *Disconnect-Cause .*", ""}]},
  336:          {avp_not_defined,
  337:           "CEA ::=",
  338:           "<XXX> &"},
  339:          {ok,
  340:           "@avp_types",
  341:           "@codecs tmod Session-Id &"},
  342:          {ok,
  343:           "@avp_types",
  344:           "@custom_types tmod Session-Id &"},
  345:          {avp_not_defined,
  346:           "@avp_types",
  347:           "@codecs tmod OctetString &"},
  348:          {avp_not_defined,
  349:           "@avp_types",
  350:           "@custom_types tmod OctetString &"},
  351:          {avp_already_defined,
  352:           "@avp_types",
  353:           "@codecs tmod Session-Id @custom_types tmod Session-Id &"},
  354:          {not_loaded,
  355:           [{"@avp_types", "@inherits nomod XXX &"},
  356:            {"CEA ::=", "<XXX> &"}]},
  357:          {recompile,
  358:           [{"@avp_types", "@inherits " ++ ?S(?MODULE) ++ " XXX &"},
  359:            {"CEA ::=", "<XXX> &"}]},
  360:          {no_dict,
  361:           [{"@avp_types", "@inherits diameter XXX &"},
  362:            {"CEA ::=", "<XXX> &"}]},
  363:          {ok,
  364:           "@avp_types",
  365:           "@end & bad syntax"},
  366:          {parse,
  367:           "@avp_types",
  368:           "& bad syntax"},
  369:          {ok,
  370:           [{"@avp_types", "& 3XXX 666 Time M 'X X X' 667 Time -"},
  371:            {"^ *Class .*", "@avp_types"},
  372:            {"^ *Failed-AVP ", "@avp_types &"},
  373:            {"@grouped", "&&"},
  374:            {"^ *Failed-AVP ::=", "@grouped &"},
  375:            {"CEA ::=", "<'Class'> &"},
  376:            {"@avp_types", "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc3588 Class\n&"},
  377:            {"@avp_types", "@custom_types mymod "
  378:                               "Product-Name Firmware-Revision\n"
  379:                           "@codecs mymod "
  380:                               "Origin-Host Origin-Realm\n&"}]}]).
  381: 
  382: %% ===========================================================================
  383: 
  384: suite() ->
  385:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 200}}].
  386: 
  387: all() ->
  388:     [format,
  389:      replace,
  390:      generate,
  391:      flatten1,
  392:      flatten2].
  393: 
  394: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  395:     ?CL("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  396:         "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  397:     ?DUTIL:init_per_suite(Config).
  398: 
  399: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  400:     ?CL("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  401:         "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  402:     ?DUTIL:end_per_suite(Config).
  403: 
  404: 
  405: %% This test case can take a *long* time, so if the machine is too slow, skip
  406: init_per_testcase(generate = Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  407:     ?CL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> check factor", [Case]),
  408:     Key = dia_factor,
  409:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
  410:         {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 10) ->
  411:             ?CL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> Too slow (~w) => SKIP",
  412:                 [Case, Factor]),
  413:             {skip, {machine_too_slow, Factor}};
  414:         _ ->
  415:             ?CL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> run test", [Case]),
  416:             Config
  417:     end;
  418: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  419:     ?CL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> entry", [Case]),
  420:     Config.
  421: 
  422: 
  423: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  424:     ?CL("end_per_testcase(~w) -> entry", [Case]),
  425:     Config.
  426: 
  427: 
  428: %% ===========================================================================
  429: 
  430: %% run/0
  431: 
  432: run() ->
  433:     run(all()).
  434: 
  435: %% run/1
  436: 
  437: run(List)
  438:   when is_list(List) ->
  439:     Tmp = ?MKTEMP("diameter_compiler"),
  440:     try
  441:         run(List, Tmp)
  442:     after
  443:         file:del_dir_r(Tmp)
  444:     end.
  445: 
  446: %% run/2
  447: 
  448: run(List, Dir)
  449:   when is_list(List) ->
  450:     Path = filename:join([code:lib_dir(diameter, src), "dict", ?base]),
  451:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(Path),
  452:     ?RUN([{{?MODULE, F, [{Bin, Dir}]}, 180000} || F <- List]);
  453: 
  454: run(F, Config) ->
  455:     run([F], proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)).
  456: 
  457: 
  458: %% ===========================================================================
  459: %% format/1
  460: %%
  461: %% Ensure that parse o format is the identity map.
  462: 
  463: format({<<_/binary>> = Bin, _Dir}) ->
  464:     ?RUN([{?MODULE, format, [{M, Bin}]} || E <- ?REPLACE,
  465:                                            {ok, M} <- [norm(E)]]);
  466: 
  467: format({Mods, Bin}) ->
  468:     B = modify(Bin, Mods),
  469:     {ok, Dict} = parse(B),
  470:     {ok, D} = parse(diameter_make:format(Dict)),
  471:     {Dict, Dict} = {Dict, D};
  472: 
  473: format(Config) ->
  474:     run(format, Config).
  475: 
  476: parse(File) ->
  477:     case diameter_make:codec(File, [parse, hrl, return]) of
  478:         {ok, [Dict, _]} ->
  479:             {ok, Dict};
  480:         {error, _} = E ->
  481:             E
  482:     end.
  483: 
  484: %% ===========================================================================
  485: %% replace/1
  486: %%
  487: %% Ensure the expected success/error when parsing a morphed common
  488: %% dictionary.
  489: 
  490: replace({<<_/binary>> = Bin, _Dir}) ->
  491:     ?RUN([{?MODULE, replace, [{N, Bin}]} || E <- ?REPLACE,
  492:                                             N <- [norm(E)]]);
  493: 
  494: replace({{E, Mods}, Bin}) ->
  495:     B = modify(Bin, Mods),
  496:     case {E, parse(B), Mods} of
  497:         {ok, {ok, Dict}, _} ->
  498:             Dict;
  499:         {_, {error, {E,_} = T}, _} when E /= ok ->
  500:             diameter_make:format_error(T)
  501:     end;
  502: 
  503: replace(Config) ->
  504:     run(replace, Config).
  505: 
  506: re({RE, Repl}, Bin) ->
  507:     re:replace(Bin, RE, Repl, [multiline]).
  508: 
  509: 
  510: %% ===========================================================================
  511: %% generate/1
  512: %%
  513: %% Ensure success when generating code and compiling.
  514: 
  515: generate({<<_/binary>> = Bin, Dir}) ->
  516:     Rs  = lists:zip(?REPLACE, lists:seq(1, length(?REPLACE))),
  517:     ?RUN([{?MODULE, generate, [{M, Bin, N, T, Dir}]}
  518:           || {E,N} <- Rs,
  519:              {ok, M} <- [norm(E)],
  520:              T <- [erl, hrl, parse, forms]]);
  521: 
  522: generate({Mods, Bin, N, Mode, Dir}) ->
  523:     B = modify(Bin, Mods ++ [{"@name .*", "@name dict" ++ ?L(N)}]),
  524:     {ok, Dict} = parse(B),
  525:     File = "dict" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  526:     {_, ok} = {Dict, diameter_make:codec(Dict,
  527:                                          [{name, File},
  528:                                           {prefix, "base"},
  529:                                           {outdir, Dir},
  530:                                           Mode])},
  531:     generate(Mode, filename:join(Dir, File), Dict);
  532: 
  533: generate(Config) ->
  534:     run(generate, Config).
  535: 
  536: generate(erl, File, _) ->
  537:     {ok, _} = compile:file(File ++ ".erl", [return_errors]);
  538: 
  539: generate(forms, File, _) ->
  540:     {ok, [_]} = file:consult(File ++ ".F");
  541: 
  542: generate(parse, File, Dict) ->
  543:     {ok, [Dict]} = file:consult(File ++ ".D"),  %% assert
  544:     {ok, [F]} = diameter_make:codec(Dict, [forms, return]),
  545:     {ok, _, _, _} = compile:forms(F, [return]);
  546: 
  547: generate(hrl, _, _) ->
  548:     ok.
  549: 
  550: 
  551: %% ===========================================================================
  552: %% flatten1/1
  553: 
  554: flatten1({Key, BaseD, FlatD}) ->
  555:     Vs = orddict:fetch(Key, BaseD),
  556:     Vs = orddict:fetch(Key, FlatD);
  557: 
  558: flatten1(_) ->
  559:     [Vsn | BaseD] = diameter_gen_base_rfc6733:dict(),
  560:     {ok, I} = parse("@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc6733\n"),
  561:     [Vsn | FlatD] = diameter_make:flatten(I),
  562:     ?RUN([{?MODULE, flatten1, [{K, BaseD, FlatD}]}
  563:           || K <- [avp_types, grouped, enum]]).
  564: 
  565: 
  566: %% ===========================================================================
  567: %% flatten2/1
  568: 
  569: flatten2(_) ->
  570:     Dict1 =
  571:         "@name diameter_test1\n"
  572:         "@prefix diameter_test1\n"
  573:         "@vendor 666 test\n"
  574:         "@avp_vendor_id 111 A1 A3\n"
  575:         "@avp_vendor_id 222 A4 A6\n"
  576:         "@custom_types " ++ ?S(?MODULE) ++ " A1 A4\n"
  577:         "@codecs " ++ ?S(?MODULE) ++ " A3 A6\n"
  578:         "@avp_types\n"
  579:         "A1 1001 Unsigned32 V\n"
  580:         "A2 1002 Unsigned32 V\n"
  581:         "A3 1003 Unsigned32 V\n"
  582:         "A4 1004 Unsigned32 V\n"
  583:         "A5 1005 Unsigned32 V\n"
  584:         "A6 1006 Unsigned32 V\n"
  585:         "@end ignored\n",
  586:     Dict2 =
  587:         "@name diameter_test2\n"
  588:         "@prefix diameter_test2\n"
  589:         "@vendor 777 test\n"
  590:         "@inherits diameter_test1 A1 A2 A3\n"
  591:         "@inherits diameter_gen_base_rfc6733\n"
  592:         "@avp_vendor_id 333 A1\n",
  593: 
  594:     {ok, [E1, F1]}
  595:         = diameter_make:codec(Dict1, [erl, forms, return]),
  596:     ct:pal("~s", [E1]),
  597:     diameter_test1 = M1 = load_forms(F1),
  598: 
  599:     {ok, [D2, E2, F2]}
  600:         = diameter_make:codec(Dict2, [parse, erl, forms, return]),
  601:     ct:pal("~s", [E2]),
  602:     diameter_test2 = M2 = load_forms(F2),
  603: 
  604:     Flat = lists:flatten(diameter_make:format(diameter_make:flatten(D2))),
  605:     ct:pal("~s", [Flat]),
  606:     {ok, [E3, F3]}
  607:         = diameter_make:codec(Flat, [erl, forms, return,
  608:                                      {name, "diameter_test3"}]),
  609:     ct:pal("~s", [E3]),
  610:     diameter_test3 = M3 = load_forms(F3),
  611: 
  612:     [{1001, 111, M1, 'A1'},  %% @avp_vendor_id
  613:      {1002, 666, M1, 'A2'},  %% @vendor
  614:      {1003, 111, M1, 'A3'},  %% @avp_vendor_id
  615:      {1004, 222, M1, 'A4'},  %% @avp_vendor_id
  616:      {1005, 666, M1, 'A5'},  %% @vendor
  617:      {1006, 222, M1, 'A6'},  %% @avp_vendor_id
  618:      {1001, 333, M2, 'A1'},  %% M2 @avp_vendor_id
  619:      {1002, 666, M2, 'A2'},  %% M1 @vendor
  620:      {1003, 666, M2, 'A3'},  %% M1 @vendor
  621:      {1001, 333, M3, 'A1'},  %% (as for M2)
  622:      {1002, 666, M3, 'A2'},  %%   "
  623:      {1003, 666, M3, 'A3'}]  %%   "
  624:         = [{Code, Vid, Mod, Name}
  625:            || Mod <- [M1, M2, M3],
  626:               Code <- lists:seq(1001, 1006),
  627:               Vid <- [666, 111, 222, 777, 333],
  628:               {Name, 'Unsigned32'} <- [Mod:avp_name(Code, Vid)]],
  629: 
  630:     [] = [{A,T,M,RC} || A <- ['A1', 'A3'],
  631:                         T <- [encode, decode],
  632:                         M <- [M2, M3],
  633:                         Ref <- [make_ref()],
  634:                         RC <- [M:avp(T, Ref, A, #{module => M})],
  635:                         RC /= {T, Ref}].
  636: 
  637: 'A1'(T, 'Unsigned32', Ref, _Opts) ->
  638:     {T, Ref}.
  639: 
  640: 'Unsigned32'(T, 'A3', Ref, _Opts) ->
  641:     {T, Ref}.
  642: 
  643: load_forms(Forms) ->
  644:     {ok, Mod, Bin, _} = compile:forms(Forms, [return]),
  645:     {module, Mod} = code:load_binary(Mod, ?S(Mod), Bin),
  646:     Mod.
  647: 
  648: %% ===========================================================================
  649: 
  650: modify(Bin, Mods) ->
  651:     lists:foldl(fun re/2, Bin, Mods).
  652: 
  653: norm({E, RE, Repl}) ->
  654:     {E, [{RE, Repl}]};
  655: norm({_,_} = T) ->
  656:     T.
  657: 
  658: dict() ->
  659:     [0 | orddict:new()].
